titles.title: Ensuring Outpatient Quality for Rural States Act
Ensuring Outpatient Quality for Rural States Act

A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for the application of a cost-of-living adjustment to the non-labor related portion for hospital outpatient department services furnished in Alaska and Hawaii.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Ensuring Outpatient Quality for Rural States Act
This bill allows Medicare payments for covered hospital outpatient services in Alaska or Hawaii to include certain cost-of-living adjustments.
